name: MBombay - Habano - Robusto
additionalNotes: MBombay Cigars was founded by Mel Shal, a former IT professional, who turned his passion for premium cigars into a successful cigar shop, and then he took it one step further by becoming a cigar crafter. Drawing on his Indian roots, Shal uses Sanskrit terms to name his cigars’ vitola and lines. His intricately designed bands and cigar boxes are also inspired by his home country’s heritage. Beautifully handmade in Costa Rica, MBombay cigars are known for adhering to traditional Cuban rolling methods, excellent construction, wonderful aroma and taste.
